自定义模板

2021-01-01

使用template/{your-template-name}.html渲染数据，可自行定义展示样式

数据

  1. 站点设置

    • 站点信息，map 类型

        {{.Site}}

    • 站点名称，string 类型

        {{.Site.Name}}

    • 站点域名，string 类型

        {{.Site.Origin}}

  2. 主题设置

    • 主题信息，map 类型

        {{.Theme}}

    • 版权信息，string 类型

        {{.Theme.copyright}}

    • 统计信息，string 类型

        {{.Theme.analysis}}

  3. 关联列表

    • 关联内容，array类型

        {{.Catalog}}

      • 详情信息，map 类型

          {{.Message}}

      • Meta 信息，map 类型

          {{.Message.Meta}}

举例

  • index.html

      1{{define "index"}}
  2  <!DOCTYPE html>
  3  <html lang="en">
  4      <head>
  5          <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  6          <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
  7          <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
  8          <title>{{.Theme.tdk.index.title}} - {{.Site.Name}}</title>
  9          <meta name="description" content="{{.Theme.tdk.index.description}}" />
 10          <link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/css/output.css" />
 11      </head>
 12      <body class="bg-gray-100">
 13          <!-- header -->
 14          {{template "header" .}}
 15
 16          <!-- main -->
 17          <main>
 18              <!-- banner -->
 19              {{template "banner" .}}
 20
 21              <!-- highlight -->
 22              <div class="w-11/12 max-w-screen-xl mx-auto -mt-10 mb-10 bg-white rounded-xl md:rounded-3xl shadow">
 23                  <ul class="flex flex-row flex-wrap text-center">
 24                      <li class="w-1/2 md:w-1/3 py-6">
 25                          <p>
 26                              <img class="h-10 mx-auto" src="/assets/img/icon/sample.png" alt="" />
 27                          </p>
 28                          <p class="text-2xl text-cyan-900 leading-loose">Simple</p>
 29                          <p class="text-base text-gray-600">only 5 command, easy to use</p>
 30                      </li>
 31                      <li class="w-1/2 md:w-1/3 py-6">
 32                          <p>
 33                              <img class="h-10 mx-auto" src="/assets/img/icon/quick.png" alt="" />
 34                          </p>
 35                          <p class="text-2xl text-cyan-900 leading-loose">Fast</p>
 36                          <p class="text-base text-gray-600">serve & build mode, both start less than 1s</p>
 37                      </li>
 38                      <li class="w-1/2 md:w-1/3 py-6">
 39                          <p>
 40                              <img class="h-10 mx-auto" src="/assets/img/icon/i18n.png" alt="" />
 41                          </p>
 42                          <p class="text-2xl text-cyan-900 leading-loose">I18N</p>
 43                          <p class="text-base text-gray-600">add multi-language not need to change any code</p>
 44                      </li>
 45                      <li class="w-1/2 md:w-1/3 py-6">
 46                          <p>
 47                              <img class="h-10 mx-auto" src="/assets/img/icon/customize.png" alt="" />
 48                          </p>
 49                          <p class="text-2xl text-cyan-900 leading-loose">Customize</p>
 50                          <p class="text-base text-gray-600">can be blog & document & page and more</p>
 51                      </li>
 52                      <li class="w-1/2 md:w-1/3 py-6">
 53                          <p>
 54                              <img class="h-10 mx-auto" src="/assets/img/icon/markdown.png" alt="" />
 55                          </p>
 56                          <p class="text-2xl text-cyan-900 leading-loose">Markdown</p>
 57                          <p class="text-base text-gray-600">syntax highlighting & toc markdown support</p>
 58                      </li>
 59                      <li class="w-1/2 md:w-1/3 py-6">
 60                          <p>
 61                              <img class="h-10 mx-auto" src="/assets/img/icon/seo.png" alt="" />
 62                          </p>
 63                          <p class="text-2xl text-cyan-900 leading-loose">SEO</p>
 64                          <p class="text-base text-gray-600">automatic seo friendly siteamp & rss</p>
 65                      </li>
 66                  </ul>
 67              </div>
 68
 69              <!-- model -->
 70              <div class="w-11/12 max-w-screen-xl mx-auto py-10" x-data="{ active: 0 }">
 71                  <div class="w-11/12 mx-auto h-60 flex flex-col justify-center items-center">
 72                      <p class="bg-clip-text leading-loose text-5xl text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-cyan-800 to-amber-300">
 73                          NOT ONLY A BLOG
 74                      </p>
 75                      <div class="bg-clip-text leading-loose text-3xl text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-cyan-800 to-amber-300">
 76                          can be anyting what you want
 77                      </div>
 78                  </div>
 79                  <ul class="w-1/2 mx-auto h-10 leading-10 my-5 text-center bg-gray-50 rounded-full overflow-hidden shadow flex flex-row">
 80                      <li
 81                          class="w-1/3 rounded-full overflow-hidden cursor-pointer"
 82                          :class="active === 0?'bg-amber-400 text-white':''"
 83                          @click="active = 0"
 84                      >
 85                          BLOG
 86                      </li>
 87                      <li
 88                          class="w-1/3 rounded-full overflow-hidden cursor-pointer"
 89                          :class="active === 1?'bg-amber-400 text-white':''"
 90                          @click="active = 1"
 91                      >
 92                          DOCUMENT
 93                      </li>
 94                      <li
 95                          class="w-1/3 rounded-full overflow-hidden cursor-pointer"
 96                          :class="active === 2?'bg-amber-400 text-white':''"
 97                          @click="active = 2"
 98                      >
 99                          PAGE
100                      </li>
101                      <li
102                          class="w-1/3 rounded-full overflow-hidden cursor-pointer"
103                          :class="active === 3?'bg-amber-400 text-white':''"
104                          @click="active = 3"
105                      >
106                          MORE
107                      </li>
108                  </ul>
109                  <div class="w-3/4 mx-auto py-10 flex flex-row" x-show="active === 0">
110                      <p class="w-1/2 text-center">
111                          <img class="w-3/4 mx-auto" src="https://cdn.fundipper.cn/110119120/fundipper/official/project/travel.webp" alt="" />
112                      </p>
113                      <div class="w-1/2">
114                          <p class="text-xl text-center">1</p>
115                          <div>sfs</div>
116                      </div>
117                  </div>
118                  <div class="w-3/4 mx-auto py-10 flex flex-row" x-show="active === 1">
119                      <p class="w-1/2 text-center">
120                          <img class="w-3/4 mx-auto" src="https://cdn.fundipper.cn/110119120/fundipper/official/project/travel.webp" alt="" />
121                      </p>
122                      <div class="w-1/2">
123                          <p class="text-xl text-center">2</p>
124                          <div>sfs</div>
125                      </div>
126                  </div>
127                  <div class="w-3/4 mx-auto py-10 flex flex-row" x-show="active === 2">
128                      <p class="w-1/2 text-center">
129                          <img class="w-3/4 mx-auto" src="https://cdn.fundipper.cn/110119120/fundipper/official/project/travel.webp" alt="" />
130                      </p>
131                      <div class="w-1/2">
132                          <p class="text-xl text-center">3</p>
133                          <div>sfs</div>
134                      </div>
135                  </div>
136                  <div class="w-3/4 mx-auto py-10 flex flex-row" x-show="active === 3">
137                      <p class="w-1/2 text-center">
138                          <img class="w-3/4 mx-auto" src="https://cdn.fundipper.cn/110119120/fundipper/official/project/travel.webp" alt="" />
139                      </p>
140                      <div class="w-1/2">
141                          <p class="text-xl text-center">4</p>
142                          <div>sfs</div>
143                      </div>
144                  </div>
145              </div>
146
147              <!-- install -->
148              <div class="{{.Theme.color.background}}">
149                  <div class="w-11/12 max-w-screen-md mx-auto py-10 text-white flex flex-col justify-center items-center">
150                      <p
151                          class="h-10 leading-10 text-3xl text-center text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-white to-amber-300"
152                      >
153                          HOW TO INSTALL
154                      </p>
155                      <ul>
156                          <li class="h-10 leading-10">go</li>
157                          <li class="h-10 leading-10 px-5 my-5 bg-yellow-300 rounded-md text-black">
158                              $ go install github.com/fundipper/fungo@latest
159                          </li>
160                          <li class="h-10 leading-10">docker</li>
161                          <li class="h-10 leading-10 px-5 my-5 bg-yellow-300 rounded-md text-black">$ docker pull fundipper/fungo:latest</li>
162                      </ul>
163                      <p class="w-1/2 h-10 leading-10 flex flex-row justify-between items-center">
164                          <span class="w-2/3">support on</span>
165                          <span class="w-1/3 flex flex-row justify-between">
166                              <img class="h-6 lazy" src="/assets/img/loading.gif" data-src="/assets/img/icon/macos.png" alt="macos" />
167                              <img class="h-6 lazy" src="/assets/img/loading.gif" data-src="/assets/img/icon/linux.png" alt="linux" />
168                              <img class="h-6 lazy" src="/assets/img/loading.gif" data-src="/assets/img/icon/windows.png" alt="windows" />
169                          </span>
170                      </p>
171                  </div>
172              </div>
173
174              <div class="w-11/12 max-w-screen-xl mx-auto py-10">
175                  <p
176                      class="py-5 leading-loose text-3xl text-center text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-600 to-amber-300"
177                  >
178                      RELEASES & TAGS
179                  </p>
180                  <ul class="grid grid-cols-2 gap-5">
181                      {{ range .Catalog}}
182                      <li class="px-5 py-5 bg-white rounded-md hover:shadow">
183                          <a href="{{toLower .Name}}">
184                              <p class="h-10 leading-10 text-cyan-900 text-xl">{{.Meta.title}}</p>
185                              <p class="h-10 leading-10 text-gray-600 text-base whitespace-nowrap text-ellipsis overflow-hidden">
186                                  {{.Meta.description}}
187                              </p>

189                          </a>
190                      </li>
191                      {{end}}
192                  </ul>
193              </div>
194          </main>
